title: opencv gcc7 and gcc8 conflicts in spec
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install opencv
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "opencv@4.1.0%gcc@8.3.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +calib3d+core+cuda+dnn+eigen~fast-math+features2d+flann+gtk+highgui+imgproc+ipp+ipp_iw+jasper+java+jpeg+lapack+ml+opencl+opencl_svm+openclamdblas+openclamdfft+openmp+png~powerpc+pthreads_pf+python~qt+shared+stitching+superres+tiff+ts+video+videoio+videostab~vsx+vtk+zlib arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512/ie3ovjk"
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux ubuntu 5.0.0-37-generic #40~18.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Thu Nov 14 12:06:39 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS
``` 

compilers.yaml: [compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3980983/compilers.yaml.txt)


### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status opencv
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   opencv

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "opencv@4.1.0%gcc@8.3.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +calib3d+core+cuda+dnn+eigen~fast-math+features2d+flann+gtk+highgui+imgproc+ipp+ipp_iw+jasper+java+jpeg+lapack+ml+opencl+opencl_svm+openclamdblas+openclamdfft+openmp+png~powerpc+pthreads_pf+python~qt+shared+stitching+superres+tiff+ts+video+videoio+videostab~vsx+vtk+zlib arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512/ie3ovjk"

List of matching conflicts for spec:

    opencv@4.1.0%gcc@8.3.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +calib3d+core+cuda+dnn+eigen~fast-math+features2d+flann+gtk+highgui+imgproc+ipp+ipp_iw+jasper+java+jpeg+lapack+ml+opencl+opencl_svm+openclamdblas+openclamdfft+openmp+png~powerpc+pthreads_pf+python~qt+shared+stitching+superres+tiff+ts+video+videoio+videostab~vsx+vtk+zlib arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
        ^cmake@3.16.1%gcc@8.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
            ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@8.3.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
                ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
            ^openssl@1.1.1d%gcc@8.3.0+systemcerts arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
                ^perl@5.30.0%gcc@8.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512

1. "%gcc@7:" conflicts with "opencv+cuda"
```
